processingCommand.script:
Echo on
${XT_FILEWATCHER} file=${ResponseFileSource} ${FileWatcherOptions}
Echo off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo FileWatcher ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
